function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to aerosolized virus particles during the experimental protocol","Impact":"Risk of virus transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment, proper ventilation, and decontamination procedures","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C irradiation, air purifiers","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and support staff","Owner":"Laboratory management and safety officers"},{"Description":"Handling virus infectivity assays without proper safety protocols","Impact":"Risk of accidental exposure and infection","Mitigation":"Use of biosafety cabinets, personal protective equipment, and adherence to biosafety guidelines","Technologies":"Biosafety cabinets, autoclaves, containment suits","People":"Laboratory technicians, researchers, and support staff","Owner":"Laboratory management and safety officers"}]}
